name: Horizon (itch)
description:
Horizon is a game meant to showcase the beautiful audio work by Jbox You get behind a car driving along an endless coastline with fourteen of his best tracks playing along with you. Watch as the scenery changes around you with each individual track. The game currently has two separate builds. A WebGL demo version, and a standalone full game. The difference between them are some performance gains as well as song interactions.
